p: Sesquiterpenoids in blue aerial parts EOs are β-eudesmol and α-Eudesmol, they did not exist in roots EO color or dehydrogenation of β-eudesmol and α-eudesmol are responsible for blue color.The creation of blue color in ripe fruits EO can be due to the presence of camazulene (0.2%) ( Goodarzi et al., 2016a).
